DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety immunogenicity quadrivalent influenza virus vaccine healthy people age year 3-60.Subjects randomly divide 3 group , receive test vaccine , commercially available trivalent influenza vaccine trivalent influenza vaccine contain new influenza B component respectively . Each group 800 subjects,2400 total .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Study Quadrivalent Influenza Virus Vaccine Healthy People Aged Years 3-60
DOC.criteria: healthy subject 3 year old , subject informed consent , sign inform consent . subject guardians obey demand scheme . Axillary temperature le 37℃ The people flu influenzalike symptom ( fever < axillary temperature ≥38 ℃ > , cough sore throat ) within 3 month The people vaccinate influenza vaccine 3years . The people vaccine allergy , allergic kind composition experimental vaccine , egg , ovalbumin etc . The people serious side effect vaccine , allergy , urticaria , skin eczema , dyspnea , angioneurotic edema abdominal pain . subject symptom acute infection within week . Autoimmune diseases Immune function defect , people immunosuppressive therapy , cytotoxic treatment inhale corticosteroid past 6 month . People congenital malformation , developmental disorder serious chronic disease ( Down 's syndrome , diabetes , Sickle cell anemia nerve system disease ) People asthma Unstable need emergency treatment , hospitalization , intubation , oral intravenous corticosteroid past 2 year . Diagnosed abnormal coagulation ( Lack clot factor , Clotting disorder , Platelet abnormality ) significant bruise coagulopathy people history family history convulsion , seizure , encephalopathy psychiatric . alienia , functional asplenia , alienia splenectomy situation .
